mapper.insert: insert into doubleball (id, red1, red2, red3, red4, red5, red6, blue, sales, accumulatedSales, oneNum, oneBonus, twoNum, twoBonus, threeNum, fourNum, fiveNum, sixNum, year ) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{red1,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{red2,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{red3,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{red4,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{red5,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{red6,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{blue,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{sales,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{accumulatedsales,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{onenum,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{onebonus,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{twonum,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{twobonus,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{threenum,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{fournum,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{fivenum,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{sixnum,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{year,jdbcType=INTEGER} )
mapper.update: update doubleball set red1 = #{red1,jdbcType=INTEGER}, red2 = #{red2,jdbcType=INTEGER}, red3 = #{red3,jdbcType=INTEGER}, red4 = #{red4,jdbcType=INTEGER}, red5 = #{red5,jdbcType=INTEGER}, red6 = #{red6,jdbcType=INTEGER}, blue = #{blue,jdbcType=INTEGER}, sales = #{sales,jdbcType=BIGINT}, accumulatedSales = #{accumulatedsales,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, oneNum = #{onenum,jdbcType=BIGINT}, oneBonus = #{onebonus,jdbcType=BIGINT}, twoNum = #{twonum,jdbcType=BIGINT}, twoBonus = #{twobonus,jdbcType=BIGINT}, threeNum = #{threenum,jdbcType=BIGINT}, fourNum = #{fournum,jdbcType=BIGINT}, fiveNum = #{fivenum,jdbcType=BIGINT}, sixNum = #{sixnum,jdbcType=BIGINT}, year = #{year,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, red1, red2, red3, red4, red5, red6, blue, sales, accumulatedSales, oneNum, oneBonus, twoNum, twoBonus, threeNum, fourNum, fiveNum, sixNum, year from doubleball where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
